hanzi-su-wiki:
詰

Значения

Набивать, наполнять, укорачивать, быть полным (забитым), давать усадку; быть тесно уложенным; спрашивать, укорять

Мнемоника

Говорить 言 веско, ругать во благо, укорять, сдерживать, надеясь, что это принесёт счастье 吉.

Варианты

诘
purpleculture_pinyin:
jié
to investigate; to restrain; to scold
исследовать; сдерживать; ругать
rtega_mnemonic:
詰詰RS
诘诘		question, interrogate, punish, prohibit, restrain, packed
  • speech of the sage 吉 asking 言 questions; the room is packed to hear him speak 言
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 诘)
Pictophonetic: 吉 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples: 詰問 [ jié wèn ]: to ask questions; to interrogate
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 吉 [ jí ] lucky, propitious, good
heisig_keyword: packed | question, interrogate, упакованный, сжавшийся, чайный мастер, выговор
heisig_constituent: packed, say, words, keitai, mouth, aerosol, good luck, samurai, mouth, mouth2
heisig_story: A piece of writing that is pregnant with meaning and needs to be reread several times to be understood we refer to colloquially as "packed." The character sees the words as sealed tightly inside an aerosol can.
myStory: сказать спасибо, да так чтоб пачки спасибо
Keyword_KANJIDIC: packed, close, pressed, reprove, rebuke, blame
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: упакованы, близко, прессованные, обличать, укор, винить
koohiiStory1: WORDS of GOOD LUCK are PACKED into fortune cookies.
koohiiStory2: Nowadays, grafitti comes pre-packaged. The factory takes a bunch of words and aerosol cans and then makes sure the words get tightly packed inside. All you have to do is spray and everything takes care of itself!
kunYomi: つ.める、つ.め、-づ.め、つ.まる、つ.む
jp_example_words:
詰らない(つまらない): insignificant, boring, trifling
詰まり(つまり): in short, in brief, in other words, that is to say, in the long run, after all, blockade, stuffing, ultimate
詰る(なじる): to rebuke, to scold, to tell off
缶詰(かんづめ): canning, canned goods, tin can
詰まる(つまる): be blocked, be packed
詰める(つめる): pack, shorten, work out (details)
瓶詰(びんづめ): bottling, bottled
jp_readingExamples: 詰まる (つ.まる), 詰む (つ.む), 詰める (つ.める)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Say good luck to one person enough and they'll be stuffed full of that luck.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Better safe than sorry. Don't just say good luck once, make sure they're stuffed!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You stuffed them by saying good luck two (つ) whole times!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture a person with the actual words "good luck" stuffed into their body.
Ru_Meaning: packed, close, pressed, reprove, rebuke, blame
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 託 (かこつける、タク доверять, поручать), 話 (はなす、ワ разговор, речь), 詫 (わびる、タ просить прощения), 諮 (はかる、シ совет, чужое мнение)
Ru_Words:
詰めるつめる
  • набивать, наполнять чем-л., вкладывать (патрон в ружьё)
  • укорачивать, сокращать, урезывать
  • заводить в тупик, прижимать к стене
    • 詰めつめ
  • содержимое, начинка
  • крышка, пробка, конец, край
    • 詰まりつまり
  • одним словом, короче говоря
    • 追い詰めるおいつめる
  • загнать в угол, припереть к стене, настичь
    • 缶詰かんづめ
  • банка, баночный; консервы
    • 見詰めるみつめる
  • пристально смотреть, всматриваться, уставиться, впиваться глазами
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if the words (言) bring good luck (吉), cram them in

詰字的基本解释

詰
jié

詰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jié］
［《廣韻》去吉切，入質，溪。］
“诘1”的繁体字。
(1)追问；询问。
(2)责备；质问。
(3)查究；究办。
(4)整治。
(5)禁止；纠察。
(6)弯曲。参见“詰屈”、“詰曲”。
(7)犹翌。参见“詰日”、“詰朝”。

詰字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　詰； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1158第09
【唐韻】去吉切【集韻】喫吉切，?音蛣。【說文】問也。【廣雅】讓也，責也。【玉篇】治也，譴也，問罪也。【書·立政】其克詰爾戎兵。【傳】治也。【禮·月令】詰誅暴慢。【註】謂問其罪，窮治之也。【老子·道德經】此三者，不可致詰。【註】問也。【史記·平津侯傳】汲黯庭詰弘。【註】責讓也。　又【周禮·天官·大宰】五曰?典，以詰邦國。【註】詰，猶禁也。又【秋官·大司?】佐王?邦國，詰四方。【註】詰，謹也。　又詰屈。【晉書·衞恆傳】字勢云：硏桑不能數其詰屈。　又【小爾雅】詰朝，明旦也。【左傳·僖二十七年】詰朝相見。【說文長箋】本作喆朝。喆，古哲字。借明也。故明朝爲喆朝。今俗以喆爲詰，因詰喆形溷，誤。　又【集韻】丘傑切，音憩。喬詰，意不平也。【莊子·在宥篇】喬詰卓鷙。

詰字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
詰字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
scold
jié
scold
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jié］
["Guangyun" goes to Jiqie, enters quality, and stream. ]
"诘1" in traditional characters.
(1) Follow-up; inquire.
(2) Blame; question.
(3) Investigate; investigate and handle.
(4) Remediation.
(5) Prohibited; picketing.
(6) Bending. See "Examination Qu", "Examination Qu".
(7) You Yi. See "cross-examination day", "cross-examination day".
scold
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　诘; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 1158 09
【Tang Yun】Go to Jiqie【Jiyun】Eat Jiqie. [Said the text] Ask also. [Guang Ya] Let it be the responsibility. [Jade articles] Governance, condemnation, and guilt. 【Book·Lizheng】Qi Kejieer Rongjun. [Biography] Governance also. 【Rite·Monthly Order】Slowly criticize and criticize. [Note] It means that if you ask for a crime, you can cure it. [Laozi·Tao De Jing] These three are not to be questioned. [Note] Ask also. 【Historical Records·Pingjin Hou Chuan】Ji Anting Jiehong. [Note] Responsibility also.　[Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Da Zai】Five Sayings? Code, in order to cross the country. [Note] Cross-examination is still forbidden. Also [Qiuguan·Dasi?] King Zuo? Bangguo, cross-examination. [Note] Cross-examination, sincerely.　Again. [Jin Shu·Wei Heng Biography] The word momentum goes: Gong Sang can't count his criticisms.　[Xiao Erya] Again, Ming Dynasty. 【Zuo Zhuan·Xi Twenty-seven Years】Meet in the interrogation. [Said Wen Changjian] This is written as Zhe Dynasty. Zhe, the ancient philosophical character. Borrow Ming also. Therefore, the Ming Dynasty was the Zhe Dynasty. Nowadays, Zhe is used as a cross-examination, because the form of cross-examination is mixed, which is wrong.　[Ji Yun] Qiu Jie cut, sound rested. Qiao Jie, it's unfair. [Zhuangzi·Zaiyou Chapter] Qiao Xiezhuo bird of prey.

jié
вм. 诘
Radicals: 言, 吉  (say, good-luck)
Meaning Mnemonic
Say good luck to one person enough and they'll be stuffed full of that luck.
Better safe than sorry. Don't just say good luck once, make sure they're stuffed!
Reading Mnemonic
You stuffed them by saying good luck two (つ) whole times!
Picture a person with the actual words "good luck" stuffed into their body.
